name: get_all_users_preferences
description: Retrieve user preferences for personalized content delivery.

name: filter_categories
description: Filter content categories to be displayed based on relevance and user preferences.

categories.description: The names of the categories to display.

user_id.description: The ID of the user to personalize content for.

name: fetch_user_health_data
description: Retrieve the user's health-related data such as medical conditions, dietary preferences, and current physical activity level.

name: recommend_meals
description: Suggest meal options suitable for the user.

meal_name.description: The meal which you recommend to the user.
